friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's`` Meet The Press.'' Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said.`` It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury,'' she added. last month, Reps. Mike Pence of Indiana and Greg Walden of Oregon unveiled this week the Broadcaster Freedom Act, which would ban the FCC from forcing broadcasters to give free airtime to opposing sides on controversial issues. The American people cherish freedom, especially freedom of speech and of the press, said Mike Pence , a former radio talk show host who introduced the same bill in the last session of Congress when Democrats still controlled the House.
